meanings.sent1: The teacher promulges the test results to the students.
meanings.sent2: The mayor promulges new laws to the citizens.
meanings.sent3: The parrot promulges the secret to everyone in the room.
meanings.sent4: The rising sun promulges a new day full of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The loudspeaker promulges important announcements throughout the building.

meanings.sent1: The judge promulges the verdict in the courtroom.
meanings.sent2: The company promulges its quarterly earnings to the shareholders.
meanings.sent3: The clown promulges his arrival with a loud horn.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm promulges its power with booming thunder.
meanings.sent5: The town crier promulges the news in the village square.
